00020 /*****************************************************************************
00021 
00022   sc_string_view.h -- Non-owning, constant reference to a character string
00023 
00024   Original Author: Philipp A Hartmann, Intel
00025 
00026   Intended to follow C++ Library Fundamentals TS
00027     http://open-std.org/jtc1/sc22/wg21/docs/papers/2015/n4480.html#string.view
00028 
00029   NOTE: The types sc_string_view and sc_zstring_view are implementation-
00030         defined and should not be used within user models.  After C++17 is
00031         fully adopted, all uses shall be replaced by std::string_view.
00032 
00033  *****************************************************************************/
00034 
00035 #ifndef SYSC_UTILS_STRING_VIEW_H_INCLUDED_
00036 #define SYSC_UTILS_STRING_VIEW_H_INCLUDED_
00037 
00038 #include <sysc/kernel/sc_cmnhdr.h>
00039 
00040 #if SC_CPLUSPLUS >= 201402L && defined(__has_include)
00041 #  if SC_CPLUSPLUS > 201402L && __has_include(<string_view>) /* since C++17 */
00042 #    define SC_STRING_VIEW_NS_ std
00043 #    include <string_view>
00044    /*  available in Library Fundamentals, ISO/IEC TS 19568:2015 */
00045 #  elif __has_include(<experimental/string_view>)
00046 #    define SC_STRING_VIEW_NS_ std::experimental
00047 #    include <experimental/string_view>
00048 #  endif
00049 #else
00050 // TODO: other ways to detect availability of std::(experimental::)string_view?
00051 #endif
00052 
00053 #ifndef SC_STRING_VIEW_NS_
00054 // fallback to (mostly compatible) implementation from Boost
00055 #  include <sysc/packages/boost/utility/string_view.hpp>
00056 #  define SC_STRING_VIEW_NS_ sc_boost
00057 #endif // Boost fallback
00058 
00059 namespace sc_core {
00060 
00062 typedef SC_STRING_VIEW_NS_::string_view sc_string_view;
00063 // TODO: add ABI guard against inconsistent configurations
00064 
00066 class sc_zstring_view : public sc_string_view
00067 {
00068 public:
00069   /* constexpr */ sc_zstring_view() /* noexcept */
00070     : sc_string_view() {}
00071 
00072   /* constexpr */ sc_zstring_view(const char* s) /* noexcept */
00073     : sc_string_view(s) {}
00074 
00075   sc_zstring_view(const std::string& s) /* noexcept */
00076     : sc_string_view(s) {}
00077 
00078   /* constexpr */ void swap(sc_zstring_view& s) /* noexcept */
00079     { sc_string_view::swap(s); }
00080 
00081   /* constexpr */ const char* c_str() const /* noexcept */
00082     { return data(); }
00083 
00084 private:
00085   // Hide invariant-breaking function
00086   using sc_string_view::remove_suffix;
00087 }; // class sc_zstring_view
00088 
00089 } // namespace sc_core
00090 
00091 #undef SC_STRING_VIEW_NS_
00092 #endif // SYSC_UTILS_STRING_VIEW_H_INCLUDED_
00093 // Taf!
